name: Pong II: Legend of the Ball Paddlers
name_original: Pong II: Legend of the Ball Paddlers
description:
Made for Awful Summer Jam 2018

The year is 2472, 500 years after the Great Pong War had ended. After a long era of peace, the goddess Andrea has issued a challenge to the world's remaining inhabitants - defeat her three guardians in battle to ascend to the Pong Plane, and achieve immortality. But only one will ascend... Only one can be titled the Lord of Pong.

Keyboard/gamepad supported. Game will always show default controls, but they can be customized in the Unity launcher.

Code / Art / Design: SupSuper, Raujinn, EcoJak
Music / Menu SFX: Noyemi
Voices: Mihai Zetta (Black & Berry, Reaper), Xibanya (Robot), Screaming Color (Nebulus)
Misc: Freesound, Sonniss
